AboutMe.title: Who I am
AboutMe.text: Hello! I'm Igor Rocha, a Full Stack Engineer with 6+ years of experience developing scalable and high-performance web applications across LATAM markets. Specialized in React.js, Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, building responsive and maintainable interfaces that drive measurable user engagement. Experienced with Node.js, NestJS, PostgreSQL, and Prisma, delivering reliable API integrations and backend solutions. Contributed to international projects such as Cinemark LATAM, improving system performance, user experience, and release workflows. Strong advocate of Clean Code, SOLID principles, and modern DevOps practices (Docker, GitHub Actions, CI/CD). Collaborative and quality-driven, consistently delivering business-aligned solutions in agile, cross-functional environments.
